Hi, this is a comment.
To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard.
Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

contents.heading: Capabilities
contents.info:
The PM Group is South Texas’ premier full-service agency with a complete spectrum of marketing, creative, public relations, media capabilities and communications services all done in-house in San Antonio.

Since 1988, The PM Group has always been a full-service agency. In addition, we chose to fortify ourselves by launching complementary niche, specialty companies all with common management control and ownership to expand specialty services in an effort to minimize client costs in these areas.

contents.heading: SIN Codes:
contents.info:
• 541-1/541-IRC Advertising Services
  • 541-2/541-2RC Public Relations Services
  • 541-3/541-3RC Web Based Marketing Solutions
  • 541-4B/541-4BRC Video/Film Production
  • 541-4F/540-4FRC Commercial Art and Graphic Design Services
    • 541-1000/541-1000RC Other Direct Costs (ODCs)
    • 541-1000/RC Digital/Internet Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Broadcast TV Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Broadcast Radio Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Magazine Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Newspaper Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Out of Home Media Buying
    • 541-1000/RC Theatre Advertising

policyRepeater.sectionContent:
We are the sole owners of the information collected on this site. We only have access to/collect information that you voluntarily give us via email or other direct contact from you. We will not sell or rent this information to any business or individual.

We will use your information to respond to you regarding the reason you contacted us. We will not share your information with any third party outside of our organization, other than as necessary to fulfill your request to get a quote for media and/or advertising services.

You may opt out of any future contacts from us at any time. You can do the following at any time by contacting us via the email address or phone number provided on our website:

  • See what data we have about you, if any.
  • Change/correct any data we have about you.
  • Have us delete any data we have about you.
  • Express any concern you have about our use of your data.
policyRepeater.sectionTitle: Your Access to and Control Over Information

policyRepeater.sectionContent: We share aggregated demographic information with our partners and advertisers. This is not linked to any personal information that can identify any individual person.
We take precautions to protect your information. When you submit information via the website, your information is protected both online and offline.

We use “cookies” on this site. A cookie is a piece of data stored on a site visitor’s hard drive to help us improve your access to our site and identify repeat visitors to our site. For instance, when we use a cookie to identify you, you would not have to log in a password more than once, thereby saving time while on our site. Cookies can also enable us to track and target the interests of our users to enhance their experience on our site. Usage of a cookie is in no way linked to any personally identifiable information on our site.

Some of our business partners may use cookies on our site (e.g., Google). However, we have no access to or control over these cookies.

This web site contains links to other sites. Please be aware that we are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of such other sites. We encourage our users to be aware when they leave our site and to read the privacy statements of any other site that collects personally identifiable information.

If you feel that we are not abiding by this privacy policy, you should contact us immediately via telephone at 210-490-2554 or via email at fran.yanity@thepmgrp.com.

PrivacyFields.policyDescription: This privacy notice discloses the privacy practices for the The PM Group and our website https://thepmgrp.com/. This privacy policy notices applies solely to information collected by this website, except where stated otherwise.

gridContent.mbContent: Media buying is the process of purchasing media placements for advertising on radio, broadcast TV, cable advertising, billboards, magazines, digital advertising, or other print publications. It’s a common service among advertising and marketing agencies. The primary goal of media buying is getting maximum exposure to as many people at the lowest cost possible. This is the major point of difference with The PM Group’s media department. Everyone wants our prices!

Media buying expertise. The PM Group’s media buyers are always on top of the latest trends in the industry. They have also been around long enough to know what works and what doesn’t work best. With your business goals in mind, we are, therefore, able to provide you with the best path to follow to grow your business. The other benefit is our leverage and buying networks, which The PM Group has established over the last 30 years, giving us trust and buying power.
gridContent.mbTitle: Why is professional media buying necessary?

gridContent.mbContent:
For a better flow in the media buying process, let’s define who a media buyer is.

This is the individual responsible for the negotiation and placement of your ads on television, radio, digital, and print or any other advertising medium.

Digital media buying simply means the process of acquiring display and video ad placements on apps, websites, and other digital platforms.

From geo-fencing to retargeting, from paid serial to programmatic buying, Connected TV and more, The PM Group can deliver best in class placements at the lowest cost available with full reporting capabilities to ensure your marketing dollars have performed as planned.
gridContent.mbTitle: How does digital media buying work?

gridContent.mbContent:
The three phases of media buying at The PM Group include:

  • Pre-launch: Strategizing on vital media decisions
  • Launch: Ensuring media delivery is effective and runs as per the plan
  • Post-launch: Auditing and measuring campaign results, and making any necessary adjustments for maximum benefits
gridContent.mbTitle: The process of media planning and buying

gridContent.mbContent:
Media planning is essential in any marketing decision. This helps identify all the resources required and evaluate available options in an effort to maximize any client’s investment and results.

This reduces the risk of failure of any media campaign.

When The PM Group does media buying, we find it is always best to take time to lay out all the aspects that will go into the campaign to avoid any client disappointments. That is a primary reason our clients stay with us for decades versus just a couple of years. The PM Group focuses on client results, NOT the pursuit of new clients to replace the ones we anticipate losing. How crazy is that? Happy, satisfied clients don’t leave a successful relationship with their advertising agency.

Advertising is only useful when it reaches the right audience. Poor research on who your primary target audience should be will lead to poor media planning & poor media buying and, subsequently, poor results.

Here are the key questions we want all of The PM Group’s clients to the able answer when choosing their target audience:

  • Who do you want your message to reach?
  • Who is your primary target?
  • What is their gender?
  • How old are they?
  • How much income do they earn?
  • Where do they specifically reside?
  • Where do they work–what is their profession?
  • Are they married, engaged, single?
  • Does the desired target have certain education attainment levels?

Once you identify the consumer group you are targeting, we like to master their behavioral traits. This will help us in determining where to place your ad dollars most effectively. If you do not have adequate funds in our professional opinion to launch an effective campaign, we will tell you so. If your budget is inadequate, we won’t spend client money if it is destined to fail. That’s the level of experience and integrity The PM Group brings to the table for our clients.

Our media buying professionals perform research to know exactly what successful methods your competitor is using. The following insight about your competition can help you answer this question comprehensively:

  • Who is your primary competition targeting?
  • What media sources are they buying?
  • In what programs are they running their campaigns?
  • What dayparts are they placing their ads?

These answers will help us create media buys that will allow your business to compete favourably in the market.
gridContent.mbTitle: What is your competitor up to?

gridContent.mbContent: Based on your industry knowledge on who your primary target audience is, where we can find them, and having a defined understanding of your key competitors’ marketing moves–The PM Group media team can come up with a winning strategy for our clients. It’s what we have done successfully for over 30 years and we are still the marketing and advertising leader in our space.

This is an area that our marketing and advertising agency competitors cannot measure up to our stringent media buying standards. We are the only San Antonio area advertising agency that guarantees their clients two specific key differences: the combination of the lowest prices and a 100% or greater audience delivery.

If you went to the supermarket and bought 4 bags of groceries and they only put 3 bags in your car, wouldn’t you demand you receive the missing groceries? That is what happens when a media buying agency does not 100% guarantee their media performance for their clients!

about.content:
We often say that our best work is in the community.

Giving back to the community is an integral part of our PMG work culture. Some of our direct nonprofit partners include Brighton Center, SA YES, Soldiers’ Angels, San Antonio Sports and Robin Hood 210. That’s why we created a yearly charity fundraiser called “The Kings and Queens of Good Hearts Charity Gala” to help fund South Texas charities and local nonprofits.

In 2019, the gala raised over $470,000, benefiting children, animal rescue, education, veterans, and more.
about.title: Over the past 10 years, the PM Group has raised and donated over $12,000,000 to local nonprofits.

charityList.name: Boys and Girls Club of San Antonio
Cold Days, Warm Hearts Winter Coat Project

seo.title: Community | The PM Group

items.description: The PM Group collaborates with our affiliated companies to provide better, faster, and cost-effective results for our clients. Each company is a market leader in their respective field, with expert leadership and dedicated staff.
items.name: THE PM GROUP’S AFFILIATED COMPANIES

items.description: Noisy Trumpet is an integrated digital marketing and public relations agency with a commitment to staying abreast of industry trends. We help clients identify new and relevant opportunities to engage and connect with their customers with digital marketing and advertising, website development, social media management, and public relations.
items.name: NOISY TRUMPET

items.description: Quarter Moon Productions is a full-service television production studio specializing in TV commercials, broadcast show production, and live production. QMP opened its doors in October 2010 and produces hundreds of television commercials each year. QMP also produces independent TV shows and live sports show that air all across Texas in over 15 DMA’s.
items.name: QUARTER MOON PRODUCTIONS

items.description: PMX Events produces Celebrity Fan Fest, San Antonio’s Premier Pop Culture & Comic Con. Celebrity Fan Fest features the best A-List Hollywood Stars and celebrities, comic creators, illustrators, and artists. In addition, PMX Events produces Hollywood Car Show.
items.name: PMX EVENTS

items.description: This company produces and sells the #1 consumer savings book in South Texas with its “Book of Free” product. Nnovative Marketing Solutions brings together both consumer and merchant with its innovative approach to consumer marketing.
items.name: NNOVATIVE MARKETING SOLUTIONS

items.description: Our Hollywood Car collection has the most famous movie and television cars for rent for all occasions. Whether it’s a grand opening, company event, charity, commercial, or a wedding – we have an amazing selection of cars to wow your family, friends, or guests.
items.name: CARS AS STARS RENTALS

items.description: CSAV delivers outstanding, professional AV to your audience, without problems or surprises. CSAV handles projects of all sizes in all locations across the United States including In-Person Events, Virtual Events, Hybrid Events, Live, and On-Demand.
items.name: CONVENTION SERVICES AV

seo.title: Companies | The PM Group

capabilityCard.cardBody: Our experience in the sports and entertainment industry has allowed us to represent many industry leaders, including Six Flags Fiesta Texas, All American Bowl Game, San Antonio Spurs, San Antonio Rampage and Santikos Entertainment.

The PM Group has 30+ years of restaurant experience working with national chains like IHOP, Pizza Hut, KFC, and Taco Bell, regional chains like Cotton Patch Café, and local favorites like Rudy’s BBQ, La Fogata, and Silo Elevated Cuisine. Whether you are in the process of opening a restaurant or seeking to grow an existing business, we can help you convince people you are the place to eat at!

We work with many B2B clients from the technology sector and government agencies on branding, campaigns, and projects.

Download our GSA Statement here.

The leadership team at The PM Group will work your team to develop effective marketing materials to help articulate your firm’s unique skill sets and turn your messaging into a competitive advantage. Then, we provide unsurpassed media buying clout to get the word out!

Our nonprofit work is the work that is closest to our hearts. We have helped many nonprofit organizations – of all sizes – identify and navigate the marketing challenges associated with nonprofits. We develop, design, and implement marketing strategies that increase value for your organization through branding, community engagement, lead acquisition, data analysis, and more.

One more thing…in the past 10 years, we have personally raised over $12,000,000 for local charities through our own company-funded initiatives to make our community a better place.

New technologies have made the buying journey more complex for marketers. We explore every step of the customer journey to help craft a consistent, compelling marketing strategy designed to increase your customer acquisition and retention.

client.name: Boys and Girls Clubs of SA
The Law Offices of Thomas J. Henry

seo.title: Expertise | The PM Group

aboutEntry.content: Getting results is what matters most to us. We don’t have big artistic egos or like to waste time or money (yours or ours)! We’re here to make things happen. That’s why clients stay with us for decades.
aboutEntry.title: Our Approach

aboutEntry.content: We are flexible and we love what we do! We have both small project clients and contract clients with extensive marketing needs. We love them both.
aboutEntry.title: We Love Clients Big and Small

aboutEntry.content: The PM Group is the largest buyer of media in our region, with unsurpassed media strength, experience and resources. It’s funny how our competitors often ask the media for ‘The PM Group’ rates… only to be greatly disappointed that those rates aren’t available to agencies (and their clients) that don’t have the collective buying power of our agency.
aboutEntry.title: Media Clout

aboutEntry.content: You don’t become (and stay) the #1 advertising agency in San Antonio/South Texas for the last 20 years without a long history of client success. Ask us and we will share why clients stay with us so long when the industry average is just 4.5 years.
aboutEntry.title: Our Track Record

aboutEntry.content: Our in-house staff (NOT freelancers) from The PM Group and our constellation of companies allow us to control costs, hit deadlines and deliver high-level production values.
aboutEntry.title: Streamlined In-House Production

aboutHero.aboutTitle: What Makes The PM Group Different?

val.content:
This is an example page. It’s different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I’m a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin’ caught in the rain.)

…or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

seo.title: PMG.Header.Image_.Clean_-1 | The PM Group

about.content:
The PM Group is a San Antonio-based advertising agency that is at the hub of a group of companies under the same ownership.

Each company has its own defined specialty of marketing services. Together, we bring our skills, strengths, and resources to help our clients.

By sharing information and resources within our constellation of companies, we can work smarter, FASTER, and more cost-efficiently.
about.title: FULL-SERVICE MARKETING

aboutSection.content:
The PM Group is a San Antonio-based advertising agency that is at the hub of a group of companies under the same ownership. 

Each company has its own defined specialty of marketing services. Together, we bring our skills, strengths, and resources to help our clients.

By sharing information and resources within our constellation of companies, we can work smarter, FASTER, and more cost-efficiently.
aboutSection.title: FULL-SERVICE MARKETING

contactSection.body: We love helping businesses by creating individualized marketing plans that will help them reach their goals. Contact us today to see what we can do for you.
contactSection.name: Fran Yanity
contactSection.title: Get In Touch To Learn More

homeFields.headline: San Antonio’s Largest Advertising and Marketing Agency

heroImages.title: WHAT MAKES THE PM GROUP DIFFERENT?

howWeGotHere.content:
The PM Group was started in 1988, and we have been the largest media buyer in our region for the last 20 years. As media and technology have dramatically changed, The PM Group has transformed and continues to reinvent ourselves every 5-7 years. That’s how you stay on top and retain clients for decades!

Today, we are a focused group of affiliated companies, offering a complete range of marketing services.
howWeGotHere.title: HOW WE GOT HERE.

secondaryCta.title: SHARED KNOWLEDGE. SHARED RESOURCES. SHARED SUCCESS.

serviceEntry.content: The PM Group is the largest advertising agency in San Antonio, offering marketing, branding, and creative services. We are also the largest buyer of media in San Antonio and South Texas, with unsurpassed media clout in television, radio, outdoor, digital and print advertising.
serviceEntry.title: Traditional Advertising

serviceEntry.content: We create effective digital marketing strategies and solutions for our clients including online media plans, SEO, social media plans, and websites.
serviceEntry.title: Digital Marketing

serviceEntry.content: The PM Group has an award-winning creative team, in house, who can craft the right expression for your brand in any media. You don’t stay on-top for 32+ years unless you are getting your clients the results they expect!
serviceEntry.title: Creative

serviceEntry.content: Quarter Moon Productions is our full-service production studio, with state-of-the-art equipment, staffed with talented editors, producers, motion graphic artists and directors. We create television & radio commercials, tv shows, and brand videos for our clients.
serviceEntry.title: VIDEO CONTENT CREATION

serviceEntry.content: In just three short years, Noisy Trumpet Digital & Public Relations became the second largest PR firm in South Texas! Hard work plus great, talented staffers have lead the firm to receive numerous national awards & recognition!
serviceEntry.title: Public Relations

serviceEntry.content: The PM Group is a national leader in philanthropic and special event marketing. Be it Child Abuse Prevention Month campaigns, pop culture events like Celebrity Fan Fest, The King & Queen of Good Hearts Gala, Charitable Poker Tournaments, Charitable Golf Tournaments and High School Football bowl games. In addition, we partner with national and local brands on sales growth promotions for clients that puts smiles on the faces of our clients!
serviceEntry.title: EVENTS, PROMOTIONS, AND FUNDRAISERS
